# Commit Format:
# <type>(scope): <short summary>
#
# Example:
# feat(auth): add JWT-based login and registration
#
# Types: feat, fix, refactor, docs, style, test, chore

# ----------------------------

<type>(<scope>): 

# Short summary above (keep under 72 characters)
#
# [Optional body]
# - What was added, changed, or fixed?
# - Why was it needed?
# - Any relevant context or links?
#
# [Optional footer]
# - BREAKING CHANGE:
# - Closes #<issue-number>
